file_cache¶

class ctxalgolib.cache.file_cache.FileCache(cache_folder, reuse=True)¶

Bases: ctxalgolib.cache.abstract_cache.AbstractCache

Implement in-file caching mechanism

Init file cache. :param cache_folder: string, folder location to initialize :param reuse: boolean, indicate whether reuse the previous cache or empty it first :return: None.

clear()¶

Remove all items cached. :return: None

get_value(key)¶

Get value according to key. :param key: String, the key of cached value :return: cached value or raise KeyError exception if key doesn’t exist.

remove_value(key)¶

Remove cached value according to key. :param key: String, key of cached item :return:

set_value(key, value, expiretime=None)¶

Cache the value with key and expire time. :param key: String, the key of cached item :param value: Object, the value of cached item :param expiretime: int, seconds to keep cached data :return: no
